entry.title: Lousy Lifehacks
entry.summary:
Lousy lifehacks is a simple Ember app where a user can search for Lifehack videos for anything they might want to learn about. The app returns videos with low view counts (by searching for most recently uploaded), ensuring hilarious results. View a live version of the app here

My role â€¦
entry.content:
Lousy lifehacks is a simple Ember app where a user can search for Lifehack videos for anything they might want to learn about. The app returns videos with low view counts (by searching for most recently uploaded), ensuring hilarious results. View a live version of the app here

My role in the project was to construct the backend. We used the JavaScript framework Ember.js to request data from the YouTube API and then filter out the results to fit what we were looking for. This was one of my first experiences working on the backend side of a project. I was very happy with the results for being a beginner.

Lousy Lifehacks gitHub repo

By Oskar Radon, Keir Staple, Andrew Telleria, and Trevor Elvey
